dict.acceptation: 承认；鸣谢；对…打招呼；告知已收到；

sent.orig: So the mother to acknowledge the criticism part, and the daughter to acknowledge the caring part.
sent.trans: 所以，母亲需要承认自己带有批评意味的部分，而女儿也需要承认母亲关爱自己的部分。

sent.orig: Even, even though many of them acknowledge acknowledge the hundred 100 days' mark an arbitrary number.
sent.trans: 他们其中很多人都承认给这100天的政绩打的分是个武断的数字。

sent.orig: The critic should acknowledge the complexity and inherent ambiguity of the policymaker's choices.
sent.trans: 评论者应该承认决策者作出抉择的复杂性及难以避免的缺乏鲜明性。

sent.orig: The candidate waved his hands to acknowledge the cheers of the crowd.
sent.trans: 候选人挥手对大众的欢呼表示感谢。
我们应当告诉他信收到了。
